select t.userAccount,t.positionId from ( select hul.user_login_name as userAccount,t2.position_id as positionId from hx_user_unload hul inner join ( select heu.user_login_name,heu.position_id,left(ee.positioncode,(length(ee.positioncode)-10)) as org_id from hx_emp_unload heu,emp_empposition ee where heu.position_id=ee.positioncode union select hup.user_login_name,hup.position_id,hp.org_id from hx_user_position hup,hx_position hp where hup.position_id=hp.position_code ) t2 on hul.user_login_name=t2.user_login_name and hul.user_active='1' where 1=1
and t2.position_id in
#{item}
and hul.user_org_id = (select service_unit from (select service_unit,service_id as id from hx_service_ticket union select service_unit,apply_id as id from hx_service_long_distance union select service_unit,apply_id as id from hx_service_retreat_replacement union select service_unit,settlement_id as id from hx_examine_settlement_ticket ) t1 where t1.id = #{id} ) ) t

select t.userAccount,t.positionId from ( select hul.user_login_name as userAccount,t2.position_id as positionId from hx_user_unload hul inner join ( select heu.user_login_name,heu.position_id,left(ee.positioncode,(length(ee.positioncode-10))) as org_id from hx_emp_unload heu,emp_empposition ee where heu.position_id=ee.positioncode union select hup.user_login_name,hup.position_id,hp.org_id from hx_user_position hup,hx_position hp where hup.position_id=hp.position_code ) t2 on hul.user_login_name=t2.user_login_name and hul.user_active='1' where 1=1
and t2.position_id in
#{item}
and hul.user_org_id in ( SELECT DISTINCT hfp.org_code FROM hx_fittingstock_part hfp WHERE hfp.part_id IN (SELECT hcsm.dqgsdm FROM hx_custom_sale_mapping hcsm WHERE hcsm.shgsdm in (SELECT t.gsxx01 FROM (SELECT cw.azwd01 AS org_code, cw.gsxx01 FROM crm_website cw UNION SELECT ho.org_code, ho.org_parent_id AS gsxx01 FROM hx_organization ho WHERE ho.org_type = '02' OR ho.org_type = '03' UNION SELECT es.WERKS AS org_code, es.VKORG AS gsxx01 FROM ecc_store es WHERE es.VKORG LIKE 'S%' ) t where t.org_code= (select service_unit from (select service_unit,service_id as id from hx_service_ticket union select service_unit,apply_id as id from hx_service_long_distance union select service_unit,apply_id as id from hx_service_retreat_replacement union select service_unit,settlement_id as id from hx_examine_settlement_ticket ) t1 where t1.id = #{id} ))))) t
